parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: >This parameter is currently in invitational preview and unavailable for public use.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length. For more information, see [How to ensure idempotence](~~25693~~).

parameters.name: DestinationRegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the destination region to which to copy the source snapshot.

parameters.name: DestinationSnapshotDescription
parameters.description:
The description of the new snapshot. The description must be 2 to 256 characters in length and cannot start with http:// or https://.

This parameter is empty by default.

parameters.name: DestinationSnapshotName
parameters.description:
The name of the new snapshot. The name must be 2 to 128 characters in length. The name must start with a letter and cannot start with http:// or https://. The name can contain letters, digits, colons (:), underscores (\_), periods (.), and hyphens (-).

This parameter is left empty by default.

parameters.name: DestinationStorageLocationArn
parameters.description: >  This parameter is not publicly available.

parameters.name: Encrypted
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to encrypt the new snapshot. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

Default value: false.

parameters.name: KMSKeyId
parameters.description: The ID of the customer master key (CMK) in Key Management Service (KMS) in the destination region.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the source snapshot. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: This parameter is not publicly available.

parameters.name: RetentionDays
parameters.description:
The retention period of the new snapshot. Unit: days. The new snapshot is automatically released when its retention period ends. Valid values: 1 to 65536.

This parameter is empty by default, which indicates that the snapshot is not automatically released.

parameters.name: SnapshotId
parameters.description: The ID of the source snapshot.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tag key and value of the new snapshot.
